overview: Glen is dying in a hospice all alone, the son he raised on his own is caught up in the Opioid Pandemic and is clueless that his father is dying. A priest comes to give Glen the last rites, they begin to talk, as they do, the truth about the devastation of addiction, and the complicity of BIG PHARMA and the doctors who prescribe these drugs is reviled.
title: A Stark Reality
